meanings.definition: To expel gas noisily from the stomach through the mouth.
meanings.sent1: After drinking soda quickly, he started belching loudly in class.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't stop belching after eating too quickly.
meanings.sent3: The belching contest at the party was surprisingly popular.
meanings.sent4: The old car engine was like belching smoke into the sky.
meanings.sent5: The volcano erupted, belching ash and smoke into the air.

meanings.definition: A noisy expulsion of gas from the stomach through the mouth.
meanings.sent1: The loud belching during the meeting was embarrassing.
meanings.sent2: The sound of belching echoed through the room.
meanings.sent3: The belching sound from the cartoon character made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The factory chimney was like belching dark clouds into the sky.
meanings.sent5: The belching noise from the old pipes was unsettling.
